INDIVIDUAL PARCELS

[/nectar_text_inline_images][split_line_heading animation_type=”line-reveal-by-space” font_style=”h2″ line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”default” mobile_content_alignment=”center” link_target=”_self” text_content=”A PARCEL FOR EVERY APE” text_direction=”default”]

We decided to move

forward with building

[/split_line_heading][vc_column_text text_direction=”default” css=”.vc_custom_1706706015184{padding-right: 10% !important;}”]Similar to Battle Classes are the Kingdom’s 4 land-class types: Nomadic Encampments, Settled Villages, Elite Cities and Apex Kingdom’s. We’ll cover each very briefly below.

As a Chieftain/landowner you’ll be able to carve up sections of your into parcels, to build out whatever you’d like. It’s your Encampment, Village, City or Kingdom after all. You’ll also get to section off a certain amount of parcels within your plot, for your tribe members, who’ll be able to erect their own homes. You can change the size and shape of each parcel. Wanna give an Apex Class Warrior a bigger parcel to be part of your War Party? By all means, do so.[/vc_column_text][split_line_heading animation_type=”line-reveal-by-space” font_style=”p” line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”default” mobile_content_alignment=”center” link_target=”_self” text_content=” — Pictured to the right: A Warriors Parcel on a Nomadic Encampment in Bananatopia.” text_direction=”default” font_size=”14″]

We decided to move

forward with building

[/split_line_heading][image_with_animation image_url=”8441″ image_size=”full” animation_type=”entrance” animation=”Fade In” animation_easing=”default” animation_movement_type=”transform_y” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]Similar to Battle Classes are the Kingdom’s 4 land-class types: Nomadic Encampments, Settled Villages, Elite Cities and Apex Kingdom’s. We’ll cover each very briefly below.

As a Chieftain/landowner you’ll be able to carve up sections of your into parcels, to build out whatever you’d like. It’s your Encampment, Village, City or Kingdom after all. You’ll also get to section off a certain amount of parcels within your plot, for your tribe members, who’ll be able to erect their own homes. You can change the size and shape of each parcel. Wanna give an Apex Class Warrior a bigger parcel to be part of your War Party? By all means, do so.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” top_margin_phone=”50″ column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”default” column_padding_type=”default”][image_with_animation image_url=”8588″ image_size=”full” animation_type=”entrance” animation=”Fade In” animation_easing=”default” animation_movement_type=”transform_y” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][split_line_heading animation_type=”line-reveal-by-space” font_style=”h2″ line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”default” mobile_content_alignment=”center” link_target=”_self” text_content=”NOMADIC ENCAMPMENTS: WHERE ALL CHIEFTAINS BEGIN” text_direction=”default” font_size_phone=”26px”]
